ingredients: 2 medium Potatoes, diced into 1/2 inch cubes
1/4 head Red Cabbage, thinly sliced (about 2-3 cups)
(Optional) Fresh herbs like Parsley or Chives for garnish
steps: Heat 1 Tbsp oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat
Add diced potatoes and cook for 8-10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until golden and tender
Push potatoes to the side and add remaining 1 Tbsp oil
Add onion and cook for 3-4 minutes until softened
Add garlic and cook for 30 seconds until fragrant
Add sliced red cabbage, paprika, salt, and pepper. Stir everything together
Cook for 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until cabbage is tender and lightly caramelized
If using eggs, make 4 wells in the hash and crack an egg into each well
Cover and cook for 3-5 minutes until eggs are set to your liking
Garnish with fresh herbs and serve with hot sauce if desired
title: Red Cabbage Breakfast Hash
